Name: Faceted Flight
About the game: Faceted Flight is VR's original stylized stunt flight game. Take control of the Hover Jet and challenge ghost racers in Ring Attack or explore at your own pace in Free Flight. Faceted Flight has doubled in size since it's launch on Early Access, with more updates in the works. What are you waiting for? Do a barrel roll.
